mean_cn: n. 准许进入，许可，承认，入场（费）
mean_en: the act of accepting somebody into an institution, organization, etc.; the right to enter a place or to join an institution or organization
word_etyma: admiss承认 + ion名词后缀 → admission 承认，允许进入
sentence: Sorry, no admission - you can't come in!
sentence_trans: 抱歉，未经允许，不得入内！
